scripts.prepublish: yarn lint && yarn tsc && shx rm -rf files/cache && shx mkdir files/cache && shx mkdir files/cache/yarn && shx cp yarn.lock files/cache && shx cp .pnp.js files/cache/pnp.js && shx cp .yarnrc.yml files/cache/yarnrc.yml && shx cp -R .yarn/cache files/cache/yarn/cache && shx mv files/cache/yarn/cache/.gitignore files/cache/yarn/cache/gitignore && shx cp -R .yarn/plugins files/cache/yarn/plugins && shx cp -R .yarn/releases files/cache/yarn/releases && shx cp -R .vscode files/cache/vscode && yarn build
